title: Tuning Changer
description:
A tuning changer is a plugin that triggers a tuning change based on the input MIDI messages. Currently, there are three kinds of tuning change operations that can be triggered by this plugin:
- "previous": Changes to the next tuning from the sequence. If the current tuning is the first one, it wraps around to the last tuning.
- "next": Changes to the next tuning from the sequence. If the current tuning is the last one, it wraps around to the first tuning.
- "index": Changes to the tuning with the specified index in the sequence, starting the count from 0. If the index exceeds the last tuning, a change to the last tuning is triggered.
As any plugin it can be defined as an object with a "type" property that identifies the tuning changer to be used. Check the documentation for that property for details about what tuning changer are supported.

uint7.$comment: An unsigned integer of 7 bits with values between 0 and 127, inclusive.

triggers.title: Triggers
triggers.description: The configuration of MIDI CC (Control Change) triggers that determine tuning changes. These can include triggers for previous, next tuning changes, or specific index-based tuning changes.

allOf.title: Previous Tuning Trigger
allOf.description: Configures the MIDI CC that triggers a tuning change to the previous tuning.

allOf.title: Next Tuning Trigger
allOf.description: Configures the MIDI CC that triggers a tuning change to the next tuning.

index.title: Change Tuning to Index Triggers
index.description: Configures the MIDI CCs that trigger a tuning change to various tuning indexes.

allOf.title: Change Tuning to Index Trigger
allOf.description: The value configures the MIDI CC that triggers a tuning change to the tuning index from the key.

threshold.title: Threshold
threshold.description: The threshold value for the pedal CC value input to determine if a pedal is pressed or released. Values above this threshold indicate a pressed state, while values below or equal indicate a released state. Tuning changes are only triggered when the state transitions from released to pressed.

triggersThru.title: Tuning Change Triggers Thru
triggersThru.description: Set to true if tuning change MIDI trigger messages should pass through to the output, or false if they should be filtered out.

type.title: Tuning Changer Type
type.description:
Name that serves as a unique identifier of the Tuning Changer Type. The following values are allowed:
- "pedal": allows triggering tuning changes via MIDI CC messages that are typically controlled by piano-like pedals which return to their initial position after they are pressed. It is configured by default for digital pianos with three pedals, such that the left-most pedal triggers a previous tuning change and the center pedal a next tuning change. But this can be configured, including index-based triggers which aren't enabled by default.
